bill.summary:
Autonomous Vehicle Privacy Protection Act of 2015
This bill requires the Government Accountability Office to make publicly available a report that assesses the organizational readiness of the Department of Transportation to address autonomous vehicle technology challenges, including consumer privacy protections.
